# This CmakeLists.txt file is generated by CMakeLists Editor, a tiny software developed by Tianjin University.
# this is the minimum edition required.
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.4)
IF(COMMAND CMAKE_POLICY)
	CMAKE_POLICY(SET CMP0003 NEW)
ENDIF(COMMAND CMAKE_POLICY)

# this is the project name.
PROJECT( NanoOS )


# set source file name(without path,just file name)
SET(SOURCE_FILE; ./drivers/key.c
./drivers/layer.c
./drivers/mouse.c
./drivers/screen.c
./font/font.c
./interrupt/exception.c
./interrupt/interrupt.c
./interrupt/timer.c
./kernel/kernel.c
./kernel/low_level.c
./lib/fifo.c
./lib/lib.c
./memory/memory.c
./res/resource.c
./tiny/KeyFIFO.c
./tiny/MemMan.c
./tiny/MemPool.c
./tiny/MemStat.c
./tiny/MultiLink.c
./tiny/OSTiny.c

./drivers/key.h
./drivers/layer.h
./drivers/mouse.h
./drivers/screen.h
./font/font.h
./interrupt/exception.h
./interrupt/interrupt.h
./interrupt/timer.h
./kernel/system_call.h
./kernel/system_exception.h
./kernel/system_lib.h
./lib/fifo.h
./lib/lib.h
./lib/type.h
./memory/memory.h
./res/resource.h
./tiny/KeyFIFO.h
./tiny/MemMan.h
./tiny/MemPool.h
./tiny/MemStat.h
./tiny/MultiLink.h
./tiny/OSTiny.h)

# add include files, not itk or vtk.
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES( boot
drivers
font
image
interrupt
kernel
lib
memory
res
tiny )

# generate executable file
ADD_EXECUTABLE( NanoOS ${SOURCE_FILE} )

# here end this CMakeLists.txt
